markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

I started writing a post telling my story learning Machine Learning. I was very focused throughout the day and didn’t really waste any time. I also made a lot of good progress on logo-quiz. It’s almost ready to go!

frontmatter.title: How I went from Frontend Dev to Machine Learning Engineer
